newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse index edges up after rate cut.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse index edges up after rate cut.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index closed slightly higher on Friday in the first trading session since Thursday's announcement of a cut in the average money market rate.
The 30-share index closed at 603.12 from 601.52 on Wednesday.
Volume was 1.36 million dinars against 5.77 million dinars.
Investment fund SPDIT-SICAF was up 1.1 dinar to 38.07 dinars. Banque de Tunisie rose one dinar to 79 dinars.
BIAT bank fell 1.89 to 61.16 dinars and AMEN bank eased 1.83 to 59.07 dinars.
